name: She Was A Visitor
description: She Was A Visitor is a game for you to explore. It is inspired by Implied Gallery, The Zium Garden, Alien Caseno and underground rave scene. If you think toilet sucks, you shouldn't play this game. You are allowed to get into this space only after 4am, because losers are still awake at that time. You are not allowed to bring friends with you. WHY? Cuz you suck. You got 0 friend. You are the only person/alien (whatever I don't really care) in this world. Other than that you can do whatever you want. Go explore, get lost, be confused, do wired shit, cry or laugh. It's completely safe here. This game is still developing. More space will be created for you to explore.
